thread.title: Dolly Parton addresses rumors about her health
thread.title_full: Dolly Parton addresses rumors about her health

author: Kara Apel
title: Dolly Parton addresses rumors about her health
text:
Dolly Parton addresses rumors about her health Posted: Dolly Parton is busy filming a movie for NBC. NASHVILLE, TN (WSMV) - 
Singer Dolly Parton is clearing up some rumors about her health. 
Rumors were circulating online that she was battling stomach cancer, but Parton says that is not true. 
Parton said she had kidney stones removed a couple weeks ago but is doing fine now. 
She has been keeping busy at Dollywood, filming scenes for her new movie, Coat of Many Colors. The movie premieres on Channel 4 on Dec. 10. 
Here is Parton's full statement: 
It is true that I had kidney stones. I had them removed three weeks ago and I am doing just fine! I am back to work and last week I was at Dollywood filming parts for my new movie "Coat of Many Colors," which premieres December 10th on NBC. With the 30th Anniversary of Dollywood, I did a full week of activities promoting my new DreamMore Resort's opening. There is absolutely no truth at all that I have stomach cancer. I love and appreciate everyone's concern. 
Copyright 2015 WSMV (Meredith Corporation).
